website_summaries.verdict: A versatile massager that helps stimulate blood flow in the feet.
pros: Delivers a kneading effect that is sure to alleviate tension in the feet
Can be placed in a freezer or run under warm water to provide cold or warm therapy
Sold in multiple size options for added convenience
More affordable than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: In order to use this heated, it must be soaked in a bowl of hot water for 20 minutes. It took several minutes just to get the water warm enough to start soaking. After a half-hour of prep, the roller really wasn't more than room temperature. It's not worth the bother. The roller itself is OK but I really wish it had larger nubs to give a deeper massage on the bottom of my feet. Overall it's just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Pazur

customer_reviews.title: You can't always rely on a foot rub
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of foot issues from my time in the Army. I wear custom orthotics, and have to watch how much time I spend on my feet. At the end of the day its nice to put my feet up, but I also need to work the soreness out. This has been my best option. I keep one by my recliner at home, and one under my desk at work, I also bought one for my dad who spends 10 hours a day on concrete floors in workbooks. This helps work the pain out of our feet. You can put as much pressure as you need, and you can adjust your foot to isolate troubled spots. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gehret

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard and pokey
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say if it wasn't for my love of Gaiam products this would be a one star. The plastic it is made of is so hard it actually hurts my feet to apply pressure. I've found if I wear really thick socks it is ok, but with bare feet it is downright painful. If they were the least bit soft or squishy it would be amazing, but unfortunately it just has sharp little spikes jutting out all over it...
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Right price but deflated when I put my foot on it
customer_reviews.text: Super excited when I found this foot roller on Amazon. The price can't be beat. When I unboxed it, the foot roller was heavy and the feel was high quality soft plastic. However, once I placed my foot on it and began to roll on one foot, the entire roller collapsed and sort of deflated. I didn't expect this experience at all (thought it would be hard and solid). Not sure if mine was defective but just wanted to mention it and see if others have had a similar experience.
customer_reviews.author: art5289

customer_reviews.title: Great relief!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who was battling plantar faschiitis. He has a boot and exercises he was doing for the pain and tightness in his foot. He used this roller one afternoon and said he had profound relief in the tension. He liked that he was able to control the pressure intensity and location on his own. Putting it in the fridge for a few hours also help alleviate the pain. Even though he continues to use the boot and the exercises, this device is a great assist to his recovery!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the knock-off version of this foot roller, after trying it out and having it break after freezing it I bought this one and found it to be far superior. It's much sturdier and just a better product overall. It really has helped alleviate my foot pain if I use it daily. Love the Gaiam Massage Roller! Highly recommend this and forget about buying any other.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great for the bottom if your feet, that rarely gets attention, I recommend this before plantar fasciitis sets in as it can in many people. I believe this simple roller promotes circulation in the foot the way many of the higher priced foit massagers claim. Simple product that can travel with you...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer57

customer_reviews.title: A must bave for those with foot pains!
customer_reviews.text: My foot pain has been unbearable and I walk around a stamping plant all day. Sometimes 5-10 miles a day on hard concrete in work boots. This simple foot massager has made life enjoyable again. I highly suggest buYing one for home and one for the work place if you have foot pains like plantar faschitis
customer_reviews.author: ryan goimarac

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Get Very Cold
customer_reviews.text: I had it in the freezer over night and it still wasn't very cold, so I had to do the cold treatment with a cold pack. It seems good enough as a massage tool, but I'd hoped I could do the massage and the cold treatment at the same time. That's not going to work. It's very sturdy and well made, and maybe it heats better than it cools.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weir

customer_reviews.title: Nothing has worked as well
customer_reviews.text: If you have plantar fasciitis you probably want something like this. I've tried all types of rollers, tennis balls, bottles, and nothing has worked as well as this. And, the little nibs help foot circulation.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. WALTON

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager
customer_reviews.text: Have plantar fasciitis, this works very well, had pain for days then I received this massager, started using it with a frozen bottle of water. It hurts in the beginning but I got relief after 20 minutes. I could not walk at first and then after using it for a couple of times, I started walking again.
customer_reviews.author: LYRA GRANDS

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is much larger than I expected, and I would prefer it to be smaller to dig in a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Me Going
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! I love this doodad! I took it with me on vacation and used it each night after walking. I was able to get up and go the next morning with less pain! I also use a plantar fasciitis boot, but using it in conjunction with the roller makes a great team!
customer_reviews.author: SuzBee

customer_reviews.title: No more aching arches
customer_reviews.text: Can be used warm or cold on sore arches. Comes with instructions, easy to use and very helpful with plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: D. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Good for foot/toe cramping
customer_reviews.text: Don't really use the heat/cold part but it's really nice if you're prone to foot cramps. I dance so my feet tend to tense up since I don't drink enough water, this has helped a lot with getting those cramps out. I just run my foot over it while I watch TV or a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Great roller for my heel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on my very sore heel where I have tendonitis. I roll my foot over this several times per day. I haven't used it hot or cold yet. I take it with me when I travel, and love it. I wish it had come with a little carrying pouch, but I have the perfect one for it. What I like about this the most is that it's firm. I can really push my heel down hard onto it, and it will not budge. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MNDutchGirl

customer_reviews.title: Multiple purposes for this product
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my plantar fasciitis. It caused my feet to itch, but the pattern in the device does help with soothing your foot. I have found that it is great for headache relief. It fits perfectly in the crook of your neck . It is a good value
customer_reviews.author: Kat's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I developed plantar fasciitis from walking steep hills so I looked for something that would work quickly to relieve the pain. This item is fantastic! Use it daily to prevent the pain from returning.
customer_reviews.author: Johnette

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my health regime....sturdy and flexible.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the massage balls, but my husband actually likes this one better. We have not tried it cold or hot but it is very effective. Also, you can release some of the muscle fascia in your back by rolling on these rollers. If you are tight and can't touch your toes, try standing on a foot roller or small ball for about 30 seconds or more in the arch. Do both sides and do it daily before you stretch. I am a dancer/teacher/choreographer. I highly recommend these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Harryman

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It has drastically helped my feet
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It has drastically helped my feet. I heat this up every morning to relax my feet in the morning and then put it in the freezer so after a long day on my feet at work I can ice my feet at night. Watch out though because your dog might think that it's a sweet new toy like mine did... it disappeared for a few days and when I found it he had chewed the ends some. It rolls oddly now but still works!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Relieved foot pain after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Really feels relaxing when using this roller. I'm not interested in using the hot/cold feature and it wasn't necessary for me to feel relief from my plantar fasciitis but it is nice to have. Love it thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Plantar fasciitis cure!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cured my plantar fasciitis. Got one for my Aunt and Uncle, and for my friend that have foot issues and they are liking it too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Relief for the Flat-Footed
customer_reviews.text: I keep this handy to roll my tired achy feet back to life. It's a bit clumsy to travel with, but a necessity if you're going to do a lot of walking and you have flat feet like me.
customer_reviews.author: Hera Donaldo

customer_reviews.title: A massage for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I keep this under my desk and use it at night when my feet are tired. Feels good, like a massage for your feet!
customer_reviews.author: H. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The only reason I gave 4 stars is, I wish it stayed cold longer. It last a good 15 minutes for me.
customer_reviews.author: tmb87

customer_reviews.title: Looks used. I guess that’s one way to recycle plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it’s used. The plastic looks all scratched up and well worn. Hopefully the person before me didn’t break it. It’s in the freezer now.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Ladies and gents, If you work long hours or just on your feet a lot please get into these! I work 14 hr shifts and my feet would be so mad at me when I got home! I started taking this to work and rolling my feet during breaks and boy what a difference! Seriously pop these babies out when ever you can and you’ll even notice a difference with your mood!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay koehler

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for feet
customer_reviews.text: Aah this feels nice stimulating and refreshing. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Keshmiri

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who is dealing with plantar fasciitis. She loves it and said it feels great on her foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel good feet
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, with your feet well made just the job it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durable.
customer_reviews.text: My father in law has cerebral palsy and these are great for his feet. They really help loose the spastic muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Audry Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good
customer_reviews.text: Used as intended for foot arch...... Then figured that it might also work on spastic leg muscles. Yep!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Westmchugh

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It's larger than expected which is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's larger than expected which is a good thing. I haven't tried this with heat/cold. I use it primarily for rolling my aching arches on and it is excellent for that. No more sore feet the next day after wearing flat shoes without arch support.
customer_reviews.author: B Davis

customer_reviews.title: Slippery edges
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice, helps tiered legs, but at the same time the ends are too slippery and doesn’t work on all surfaces. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too big for smaller feet.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic, too big around for my small foot. Doesn't roll well either.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Helm

customer_reviews.title: Get this :-)
customer_reviews.text: I keep this roller under my desk, feels good and helps relax my arches. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Does seem to be helping.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week for plantar fasciitis and I do see improvement already. You can keep this in the freezer, so its cold when you use it, but it never got cold enough, so i just keep it under my desk and use it through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: jon m.

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Foot Pain
customer_reviews.text: If you’re wondering if this will help your foot pain: it helps mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small but big efect
customer_reviews.text: it is not big tool right? That the effect for foots are really good. I recomend
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra traspadini

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great..I work 10 hour shifts and this really helps. Comes with 2 I keep one at work and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot (8+ miles/4 times p/week) and my feet get tight and need to be massaged. This has been a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: TW1225

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a year. My husband stopped using it after the third or fourth time. We bought it because he is a runner and was having foot pain. He wanted it to massage the bottoms of his feet. He put it in the freezer and then rolled each foot on it. He said it was too cold and hard and didn't really give a massage feel. Basically it stayed in the freezer for a year before not being used until I gave it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: E and K Tolson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother in law. She has planter fascitis and is always in a lot of pain. This has helped her a lot even after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth eisemann

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet
customer_reviews.text: Use Every day in the morning before your feet hit the floor for 6-8 minutes. Takes a few days but it does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: ricka

customer_reviews.title: great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it looks like, and am able to use it exactly what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey a bisson jr

customer_reviews.title: Feels great warmed up and the real treat is rolling your ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the mornings, before and after I shower, sometimes before bed and always after a long day on my feet. Feels great warmed up and the real treat is rolling your hot tired feet on it after it has been in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O.

customer_reviews.title: Average roller
customer_reviews.text: Roller is made out of plastic when putting too your weight causes it to flex and the gnarl bumps are too small not giving enough massage.
customer_reviews.author: reason

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He works construction and is always in his feet so he can relax using this to get all the tightness out.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Avina

customer_reviews.title: too soft
customer_reviews.text: bends too easy under my foot. i dont get much massage. a sensitive foot might get enough out of this
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Amodio

customer_reviews.title: Not cold
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning mine. This works ok as a roller, but I bought it to be a cold roller. While it froze without an issue the plastic of the roller is too thick transfer heat well. Therefore it is doesn't work at all for cold therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I developed plantar fasciitis in my left ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I developed plantar fasciitis in my left foot and walked with pains for over a year before finding this guy. I stored it in the freezer during the day and pulled it out at the end of my day and worked it into my foot. After a few weeks of using it along with other exercises prescribed by my doctor my foot was back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Elyciphus Siler

customer_reviews.title: Too big to be practical
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little too big. A lacrosse ball is probably a better solution than this.
customer_reviews.author: David Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Great little foot roller!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this foot roller after participating in Ragnar del Sol (Phoenix, AZ) - and am very glad I've done so! I've only ever used it as a room-temperature foot roller, but I like that I have the option of making it either hot or cold. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Conner

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a good fit for my feet
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky and very stiff, this hurt my feet more then it soothed. But perhaps it just wasn’t a good fit for my sore and tender feet.
customer_reviews.author: Hector C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It provides some relief. I've used it cold only.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product was effective for first 2 weeks but split open after having been in the freezer and started oozing out gel. I had been putting it in the freezer every night and then using it every morning for my plantar fasciitis. Was helpful but then product failed. Don't recommend this product. Try icing with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Do a good job.
customer_reviews.text: We really like these. I do wish they stayed warm longer.
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: If you put hard pressure on it, it sinks in.
customer_reviews.author: ErinH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After a long day of work, this definitely makes it better!
customer_reviews.author: DaissyR

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It helps with my plantar fasciitis. It's easy to use. I use it throughout the day and before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: It's great BUT if it were slightly smaller it'd fit my lady foot more comfortably
customer_reviews.author: chessa rae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is well-made and large enough for a grown man’s foot. The only drawback is that it does not get as cold as I would like it too, even after being in the freezer a few days. It really works well on my plantar fasciitis so I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: I bought this roller because the nubs didn't look as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roller because the nubs didn't look as extreme as many others offered but I wish I would have simply purchased a smooth one instead. I am going to try this with some heavy socks on before I give up and just give it to the dog as a new play toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not too hard
customer_reviews.text: Great. A bit wider than expected, but this is a good thing. Sturdy but not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: ELVEEZ

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold for a while and feels soooo good on tired feet at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. The materials have held up to daily use. I have not used it with heat or cold, but at room temperature it is awesome. The included instructions are extremely helpful for proper use.
customer_reviews.author: GabrielleDBJ

customer_reviews.title: Achy feet!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I use this after my runs, my tired feet feel alive again. Great to prevent plantar faciitis. Using it cold feels awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: LatinMom

customer_reviews.title: Night and day difference in my feet. Only 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference in my feet. Only 5 minutes a day gives me so much relief. I take up to 20,000 steps a day.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronaudio09

customer_reviews.title: One in the bedroom and one in the great room. I use them daily and really every ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two. One in the bedroom and one in the great room. I use them daily and really every time I walk by them ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jo B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. I bought it to help with my plantar fasciitis. I get better success with a tennis ball I keep in the freezer, recommended by my chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those pesky foot problems!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend suffering with a foot condition. She loves it and swears by it. She has only used the cold method (as instructed by her doctor), so be sure to at least talk to a doctor for advice first.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: Used it about 15 times... 1st time out I noticed it was too squishy and it was pressing air out the sides the harder I stepped on it. The last time I used it the damn thing exploded with some jelly filled crap inside. Its such a mess and in the garbage otherwise I would have taken a picture. Beware if you like it hard it will eventually erupt!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cracked when I got it out of the freezer and leaked gel. Not cold either way.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Matt

customer_reviews.title: doesn't nearly get as cold
customer_reviews.text: It fits my foot great... And works as a roller... I find it doesn't nearly get as cold as the glass coke bottle I had been using, so I'm not sure I'll continue to use this as a "cold" roller... But just a regular roller.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh relief!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this roller during a physical therapy appointment. Perfect for plantar fasciitis. I put mine in the freezer and use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: It tough for me with ticklish feet, but is doing the trick
customer_reviews.author: That1guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It great it really helped my heel pain a lot and tendon in the heel part of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for a short while but it seems to be helping my plantar facietis....
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ramkaransingh

customer_reviews.title: Roller for sore feet.
customer_reviews.text: Great product to massage bottom of foot and promote healing from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: 70 yr old Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: The roller is very heavy and it actually helps reduce the pain in my feet
customer_reviews.author: Frinnet Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Stretches the arch
customer_reviews.text: I use this to roll my plantar fasciitis and it works as intended. Hurts so good! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! Help my sore feet feel as good as new. I wish I bought one when I first started working at the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: robin st

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few days and has helped my aching foot. Not planning on using the hot/cold.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good price...feels soothing to the bottom of my feet
customer_reviews.text: Roller is helping me keep circulation to the bottom of my feet. Helping me handle chemo-caused neuropathy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R.

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh, Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Great relief for sore, tired and/or achy feet. Gets the circulation going and easy on nerve endings. Great product
customer_reviews.author: H. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for feet !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Only complaint, doesn't stay cold long but it does work!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great to stretch out feet after a lot of dancing
customer_reviews.text: Have one at the office and one at home. Great to stretch out feet after a lot of dancing, standing, and walking!
customer_reviews.author: Smartladyinct

customer_reviews.title: Some cons
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight of this thing, and the shape is good, but there are two big problems for me: 1) It's really two big to use comfortably. This could easily be half of its diameter and would be a more comfortable height to use as a foot roller. and 2) The massaging "bumps" are really pointy and kinda painful if you have tender feet/plantar fasciitis. So this thing does what it says, but it's not the most comfortable foot roller out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I don't use it for heat (just haven't yet) but we keep it in the freezer and helps with heal pain after dance class!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sinder

customer_reviews.title: I had been using a tennis ball and golf ball which I still use but this is a nice substitute. I have used it frozen too and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use because of stubborn plantar fasciitis, I had been using a tennis ball and golf ball which I still use but this is a nice substitute. I have used it frozen too and it works very well. I feel that it gets into more areas over all where as the balls tend to target areas better.
customer_reviews.author: vicki nienberg

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like using this product. While I had no problem rolling the device, the nubs on the roller actually made my foot pain worse. So for me, the product was doing more damage than good. I guess it works for many, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuy

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my plantar fasciitis. I couldn’t give 5 stars for Comfort because using it is not comfortable, but it sure helped!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D Knop

customer_reviews.title: I Wasn't expecting it to spring a leak.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it for the first several weeks of use. But this morning while I was using it, it developed a crack and the gel inside started oozing out. I need to figure out how to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: The heat or cold of this roller was so insignificant as to not bring about any real change in my plantar fasciitis. The roller itself is to hard to reach into the arch and ball of foot.
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Nice for my feet...
customer_reviews.text: Used this device after my first half marathon when my arches were killing me. Very nice way to roll out the kinks.
customer_reviews.author: Anson W. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Another help for improving heel pain
customer_reviews.text: Puts warmth or cooling where it needs to go. I have had it work well for my plantar fasciitis. It is not a solution for complete relief but is a useful aid in stretching the fascia and cooling the inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend using, especially after a hike
customer_reviews.text: I can not live without this foot roller! This is my second one, and I use it every day! Would recommend using, especially after a hike!
customer_reviews.author: ejd

customer_reviews.title: ... it hot or cold yet but my foot feels great after rolling a few minutes with
customer_reviews.text: haven't tried it hot or cold yet but my foot feels great after rolling a few minutes with it
customer_reviews.author: CJV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device.
customer_reviews.text: Keep it by the side of the bed and first thing before I get up and begin walking I 'roll-out' my feet and the roller makes a huge difference in how my feet and body feel, presumably by activating nerve endings. I notice the difference if I get up in the middle of the night and don't roll. Excellent device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this foot massage roller, which is a replacement for one that I had before. I leave it in my freezer and take it out when I'm ready to use. The combination of the cold and the nubs really help to massage my tired feet at the end of each day. I suffer from Plantar Fascitis and it helps to relieve the stiff muscles. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Doxxies

product_meta.title: Gaiam Restore Foot Massage Rollers
feature_bullets: Relief from tightness, heel spurs and plantar fasciitis
Place in warm water or in freezer
